title: Searching for a Missing Cabin in Scary Horror 'The North Witch' Trailer
description: "Don't tell me we came all this way for nothing." Dark Star & Uncork'd Entertainment have revealed an official trailer for this indie horror film called The North Witch, the next freaky creation from indie genre filmmaker Bruce Wemple (he also made The Hangman earlier this year). Written by Anna Shields (Dawn of the Beast, Monstrous, Little Bi Peep), this chilling tale invites horror fans into an eerie, suspenseful journey set against the foreboding wilderness. ðŸŒ² Five women embark on a search for a cabin that mysteriously went missing 60 years ago. They soon realize that watching them is a sinister, demented being. Can they survive the horrors of The North Witch, or is death the better way out? The scary horror film stars Anna Shields, Kaitlyn Lunardi, Jessy Holtermann, Ameerah Briggs, Brianna Cala, Jeremy Cohen, and LeJon Woods. The North Witch is said to be "a haunting, atmospheric experience that keeps viewers on the edge of their seats." It looks like another The Blair Witch Project remix with some freaky new twists thrown in. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Bruce Wemple's horror film The North Witch, from YouTube: The North Witch horror film follows five women on [â€¦]

text: TRAILERS by November 17, 2024Source: YouTube "Don't tell me we came all this way for nothing." Dark Star & Uncork'd Entertainment have revealed an official trailer for this indie horror film called The North Witch, the next freaky creation from indie genre filmmaker Bruce Wemple (he also made The Hangman earlier this year). Written by Anna Shields (Dawn of the Beast, Monstrous, Little Bi Peep), this chilling tale invites horror fans into an eerie, suspenseful journey set against the foreboding wilderness. ðŸŒ² Five women embark on a search for a cabin that mysteriously went missing 60 years ago. They soon realize that watching them is a sinister, demented being. Can they survive the horrors of The North Witch, or is death the better way out? The scary horror film stars Anna Shields, Kaitlyn Lunardi, Jessy Holtermann, Ameerah Briggs, Brianna Cala, Jeremy Cohen, and LeJon Woods. The North Witch is said to be "a haunting, atmospheric experience that keeps viewers on the edge of their seats." It looks like another The Blair Witch Project remix with some freaky new twists thrown in. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Bruce Wemple's horror film The North Witch, from YouTube: The North Witch horror film follows five women on a harrowing quest to locate a cabin that mysteriously vanished 60 years ago. However, their search turns deadly as they realize a sinister & twisted entity is tracking their every move. Will they survive the horrors of "The North Witch", or will they find death the only escape? The North Witch is directed by the American indie film writer / filmmaker Bruce Wemple, director of many genre films including Altered Hours, Lake Artifact, Monstrous, The Retreat, Dawn of the Beast, My Best Friend's Dead, The Tomorrow Job, First Contact, Island Escape, and also The Hangman previously. The screenplay is written by Anna Shields. Produced by Vincent Conroy. This has premiered and can be viewed online. Dark Star already released The North Witch direct-to-VOD - it is ready to watch now. Find more posts: Horror, Indies, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
November 17, 2024
Source: YouTube

"Don't tell me we came all this way for nothing." Dark Star & Uncork'd Entertainment have revealed an official trailer for this indie horror film called The North Witch, the next freaky creation from indie genre filmmaker Bruce Wemple (he also made The Hangman earlier this year). Written by Anna Shields (Dawn of the Beast, Monstrous, Little Bi Peep), this chilling tale invites horror fans into an eerie, suspenseful journey set against the foreboding wilderness. ðŸŒ² Five women embark on a search for a cabin that mysteriously went missing 60 years ago. They soon realize that watching them is a sinister, demented being. Can they survive the horrors of The North Witch, or is death the better way out? The scary horror film stars Anna Shields, Kaitlyn Lunardi, Jessy Holtermann, Ameerah Briggs, Brianna Cala, Jeremy Cohen, and LeJon Woods. The North Witch is said to be "a haunting, atmospheric experience that keeps viewers on the edge of their seats." It looks like another The Blair Witch Project remix with some freaky new twists thrown in.

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Bruce Wemple's horror film The North Witch, from YouTube:

The North Witch horror film follows five women on a harrowing quest to locate a cabin that mysteriously vanished 60 years ago. However, their search turns deadly as they realize a sinister & twisted entity is tracking their every move. Will they survive the horrors of "The North Witch", or will they find death the only escape? The North Witch is directed by the American indie film writer / filmmaker Bruce Wemple, director of many genre films including Altered Hours, Lake Artifact, Monstrous, The Retreat, Dawn of the Beast, My Best Friend's Dead, The Tomorrow Job, First Contact, Island Escape, and also The Hangman previously. The screenplay is written by Anna Shields. Produced by Vincent Conroy. This has premiered and can be viewed online. Dark Star already released The North Witch direct-to-VOD - it is ready to watch now.

Find more posts: Horror, Indies, To Watch, Trailer
